name: Zanathid 5 Inflex
description: As standard a handgun as will be found in The Dominion, the Inflex can take standard 9mm ammo. Originally produced by Isotech, it is now widely constructed (often illegally) due to its wide design.

name: Ryx 7 Streamline
description: A handgun for the new age. Accurate, lightweight, quiet and efficient- the Ryx 7 is the sidearm of choice for countless security forces. Using energy cells ensures a power source is never far away.

name: RGI-9
description: One of the most powerful projectile weapons widely available. Used heavily by Dominion Military, the RGI-9 combines accuracy and firepower in a single package, with the inclusion of a 3x scope.

name: Orbit XB Infineon
description: Pain is the Infineon's trademark. Lethal beams of energy, the same as is used in vortex technology, are used to literally rip the target to shreads at the molecular level, causing untold agony.

name: Armalite Survival
description: Standard double-edged combat knife, designed by Federated Arms. A true warrior's tool.

name: Enfield Life Protector
description: A 'tazer' of kinds that have been seen for centuries. By passing uncountable levels of electricity through a victim, it renders the target incapacitated. Effectiveness is reduced against armoured targets.

name: FGz-78
description: Hand grenade by Federated Arms, causing a heavy hot fusion reaction, and operates on a five second fuse.

name: Militek EMP
description: Grenade by Militek Electronics, causing a heavy electro-magnetic pulse. Drains the bio-electrical supply of those caught in the blast, terminating augmentations until they can be recharged. Uses a five second fuse.

name: Techtronic 6x6
description: A tough, durable submachine gun, the Techtronic has seen heavy use by the less sociable elements of The Dominion. This weapon uses 6mm rounds.

name: HR420
description: The ubiquitous energy pistol by Gakk Industries which discharges the distinctive particles characteristic of the HR420. Popular with civilians for its reliability and affordability.

name: Linner PP7
description: The Linner PP7 is a rifle developed specifically for mid range combat. It is amongst the most accurate of the rifles due to its constant, measured rate of fire. The PP7 also inflicts higher amounts of damage per projectile as opposed to a projectile fired from the RGI 9. In the right hands, it can be as lethal if not more lethal than any other ballistic weapon. It uses reinforced 7.62mm ammunition and is also equipped with a 5x scope.

name: DOA 187
description: Popularly known as simply 'DOA', this Techtronic weapon discharges supercharged particles which are hot enough to cauterize flesh and melt the highest grades of armor. Note: This weapon is not available for trainees!

name: Salvotec HP220
description: After intense competition between rival arms manufacturers in the concussion grenade market, Salvotec emerged from the fray with the HP220, subsequently monopolizing the market with its unprecedented damage, almost zero rate-of-failure, and overall reliability in battlefield conditions. Popularly used by anti-Dominion forces for harassment purposes after a glut in the market caused the prices for the HP220 to fall drastically, making it relatively easily obtainable. Note: This weapon is not available for trainees!

name: EMP-Rv3
description: Electromagnetic pulse grenade designed to counter prevalent use of bioaugmentations by draining the bioenergy of any personnel caught in the blast. Note: This weapon is not available for trainees!

name: Gakk MG6
description: Gakk Industries' mainstay lightweight sub-machine gun utilising ballistic rounds; featuring high-capacity magazines and high rate-of-fire.

name: Hallem TAR7 Tactical Assault Rifle
description: Hallem Industries' famed high-powered sniper rifle specially reinforced through molecular reconstruction to withstand the pressure of the large-caliber rounds custom made for this weapon. Featuring a 7x zoom scope, the TAR7 has been adopted officially by the Freedom Defense Corps for use by infantry sharpshooters. Note: This weapon is not available for trainees!

name: Protonix Barracuda
description: The Former CEO of Gakk Technology Henry Wakemen has released newly founded Protonix Industries first sidearm. The Barracuda is aimed at taking on rival company Enfield using an old ballistic style firing system which the company says will ensure the safety of those targetted. It's a non-lethal civil enforcement armament, designed for use by GD personnel at close range to knock the fighting ability out of a target.

name: Chrono Enervon Pistol EP24
description: Part of Chrono Incorporated's latest series of Enervon weapons intended for tactical use. This line of weapons is unique in being able to drain a target's stamina and bioenergy through the use of superheated electrons. This phenomenon was an unexpected discovery made by Chrono Incorporated's medical wing's experiments in the use of such superheated electrons for oncological purposes. The EP24 is designed with close quarters combat in mind, being one of the more portable and compact weapons of the Enervon line of weapons.

name: Aurelian Technologies Dominator
description: A new entrant into the arms business, Aurelian Technologies released their new developmental rifle that is designed to destabilise the biocell energy stored by a persons body and prevent them from using augmentations, as well as disrupting their thought process and brain impulses, allowing easier control of the subject. Includes a 4x scope.

name: Enfield Incapacitator Rifle ER-X
description: One of Enfield Corporation's latest law enforcement weapons in the Incapacitator series designed and produced according to custom specifications provided by the Law Enforcement Department and Freedom Defense Corps. Produced specially to meet the growing demands by Global Dominion forces for a non-lethal weapon that is able to minimise risk of injury to law enforcers by having a greatly increased effective range over existing weapons. Includes a 2x scope.

name: CryoTech Medigun CM2
description: The medigun fires a stream of nano particles at the target which heals damaged tissue and ligaments. This device by CryoTech Industries is revolutionary in being lightweight and compact enough to be deployed for tactical usage on the battlefield. It is not intended to heal serious wounds and you should seek further medical help from a registered medic terminal.

name: Personal Turret
description: Utilizing advanced energy weaponry, this deployable object allows you to build stationary defense positions, attacking targets based on circumstances that you define in the confugration.

name: Experimental X-01 Gun
description: After extensive research by archaeologists on Necars Field, ancient alien technology unrelated to the current xenomorphs was discovered. Defense scientists subsequently learned how to replicate the weapon and found it to be light, yet durable and bearing a considerable ability to penetrate xenomorph carapace with relative ease using a ballistic projectile encapsulated by a shroud of special energy particles.

name: RK 2a7 Mining Tool
description: The most basic mining tool available; this firearm is capable of mining various resources from rock surfaces, depending on what is available where it is fired.

name: RX Zephyr Advanced Mining Tool
description: A mining tool manufactured for the sole purpose of mining higher class minerals to create more advanced objects.

name: Cucurbita Grenade
description: In an attempt to raise brand awareness, Salvotec Industries releases this specialty weapon. Not only does this grenade deal quite a blow, it also serves as an over the top warning to those around that you mean business.

name: Arachnid Explosive
description: Created to celebrate the Halloween season, Salvotec Industries releases this fantastically painted modification of their flagship grenade.

name: Hallem IX-78 Precision Energy Rifle
description: Created using Hallem's experimental compression technology, this limited production rifle compresses a beam of energy into a single particle and accelerates it. The heat generated by the weapon is quickly absorbed by the carbon nanotube casing, preventing most cases of overheating and allowing for faster shots than its ballistic counterpart.

name: CryoTech Medigun CM1
description: The medigun fires a stream of nano particles at the target which heals damaged tissue and ligaments. This device by CryoTech Industries is revolutionary in being lightweight and compact enough to be fit in your pocket. It is not intended to heal serious wounds and you should seek further medical help from a registered medic terminal.

name: Frostbite
description: Created using a reverse temperature polarization technique, this energy rifle fires at a faster rate and deals stamina damage.

name: U-V890 Hyper Advanced Mining Tool
description: Capable of mining the highest class rocks available, this precision instrument mines the resources necessary for the most advanced production techniques.

name: Linner PP-X
description: Designed by Dominion engineers, this weapon was intended for the population control of the rapidly reproducing xenomorph species.

name: Hawk-72
description: Created by American Enterprises, this amazing piece of technology is capable of killing Xenomorphs and humans alike, without requiring the same effort and ability as other weapons.

name: Zanathid 5.5 CopKiller
description: Utilizing a special type of 9mm round, this illegal modification of the Zanathid 5 Inflex is capable of piercing any time of armor on the market. Meant as a weapon able to be used against those with significant armor, it certainly packs a punch.

name: Backer Rifle
description: A reward for backing our Kickstarter campaign, this rifle will make your dedication to the game clear.

name: 9mm Standard Rounds

name: Energy Cell

name: Biocell
description: A relatively new innovation, biocells are a disposable energy supply which can interface directly with your body's neural system, and recharge the energy supply used to power augmentations.

name: Small MediKit
description: A small, disposable treatment kit. Healing times are long, but the production is cheap.

name: Standard MediKit
description: An average sized treatment kit. Provides standard healing times with good item production costs.

name: Battle MediKit
description: A large treatment kit, containing sufficient materials to stabilize and maintain a patient's health quickly and efficiently. Healing is fast, but production is not cheap.

name: Emergency MediKit
description: A fully stocked treatment kit, including surgical implements and a range of experimental medicines. This kit provides the best healing times, but is expensive in production.

name: Nanomachine Autoinjector
description: A portable means of providing an intramuscular infusion of restorative nanomachines, utilizing freon gas compressed to 1500 atmospheres. Requires care to ensure nanomachines are infused into areas that have a high concentration of blood capillaries to ensure maximum dispersal rates.

name: Nanomachine Autoinjector Mk2
description: An advanced version of a means of providing an intramuscular infusion of restorative nanomachines, utilizing freon gas compressed to 1500 atmospheres. Due to improvements in the nanomachines utilized, the autoinjector can be administered to any part of the body with no decrease in efficacy, as well as have a higher rate of healing overall. As this is still a prototype, it has not been made available to the general public for use and production.

name: Adrenaline Autoinjector
description: Containing a single dose of adrenaline, this item was originally designed for the military for use in combat to give soldiers the strength to endure strenuous physical activity for a period longer than they would normally be able to. The adrenaline is injected intramuscularly by a disposable canister of compressed freon.

name: Electrolyte Autoinjector
description: Containing electrolytes saturated with organic energy particles, this item was originally designed for the military for use in combat to give soldiers a near immediate infusion of bioenergy. Due to the relatively small amount of bioenergy it replenishes, it was prescribed to be used only in emergencies The electrolytes are injected intramuscularly by a disposable canister of compressed freon.

name: Night Vision Augmentation
description: Feeding off the body's bio-electrical energy supply, this gadget will illuminate dark areas.

name: Stamina Amplification
description: Interfacing directly with the human respiratory system, the stamina amplification channels into the bio-electrical energy supply also, thus giving the user far greater endurance.

name: Shoulder Lamp
description: A simple directional lamp which mounts on the shoulder for low tech illumination. Runs off the body's bio-electrical supply.

name: Resistance Amp
description: This augmentation uses a scarcely understood procedure of transforming bio-electrical charges in the body into fresh tissue, thus performing a rapid, albeit inefficient, healing process.

name: Shield Augmentation
description: An experimental device, the shield device projects a protective bubble around the user, which offers armor, shielding attributes or both. The amount of armor vs. shielding can be adjusted via a slider. You can either have full armor, full shielding or a value inbetween. Feeds off the body's bio-electrical supply.

name: Infiltration Scanner Augmentation
description: Through careful manipulation of the Vortex Network, this special augmentation will allow the user access to locked apartments. During apartment entrance, this augmentation will be capable of scanning the Vortex Aura, recording the targeting information to a ticket in the user's inventory. Accessing a special menu while at an Apartment Complex will allow the user to hack into the apartment and steal goods from inside.

name: Portable Vortex Particle Emitter
description: This latest product to be invented by the engineers in Vortex Incorporated, informally dubbed the 'vortex-on-the-go'. It requires a full biocell upon activation and consumes a large amount of bioenergy during the countdown in order to power a compact, high-powered emitter which envelops the user with a considerable amount of vortex particles, and create a strong enough link to the vortex network.

name: Mineral Scanner
description: Using advanced geological surveying techniques, this augmentation will allow you to locate specific mineral deposits and mine them.

name: Hunter VX270
description: Utilizing the fallen government's Universal Positioning System, this augmentation will allow you to locate specific individuals, regardless of where they are in the galaxy. The precision of the scan depends on how long they remain in the same area. Through special modifications made to the technology, this augmentation can also view the history of any apartment safe.

name: Advanced Civilian Helmet
description: The Advanced Civilian armor was designed for deep planetary mining operations. Although designed for civilian use, this heavy armor has seen many military campaigns as well.

name: MT-27 Ballistics Helmet
description: The MT-27 Ballistics armor was originally designed for use in militias. This mass-produced armor offers more than adequate protection for reasonable prices.

name: Tactical Systems Helmet
description: The Tactical Systems armor is the basis for the most advanced armor available today. Its unique blend of lightweight compounds and an easy to repair design has inspired many to further develop the system.

name: Locans Defense Helmet
description: After Locans Systems was edged out of the armor market, larger corporations took over their designs. The remade Locans Defense armors retain their resistance against higher mass ballistics, while using materials that allow them to be viable in regular combat.

name: Pythica Special Operations Helmet
description: The favorite of vehicle crewmen, scouts and certain special forces, Special Operations Armor is a hardy Dominion standard that has seen relatively little innovation since the days before handheld energy weapons.

name: Pythica Mobile Infantry Helmet
description: Used widely by Dominion troops since the first Necar’s Field Conflict, some veterans swear by the fit and feel of this classic armor. Interlocking tensile and ceramic plates designed to make enemy ballistics nonfatal still provide mild protection against heat.

name: Pythica S1 Helmet
description: The Pythica S1 armors have been engineered to be lighter than the Pythica Battle armor series, allowing for slightly better endurance. Based on the crystal lattice technology used in many heavier armors, this armor uses less material for a lighter wear.

name: Pythica Sustained Battle Helmet
description: The Pythica Sustained Battle series of armor is the revolutionized self of its earlier Ceremonial versions. It provides unrivalled protection, with even higher density made possible by further research into crystal lattice technology.

name: NanoTech Trauma Helmet
description: Originally designed by CryoTech Industries for use in front-line triages, automated injectors throughout the inner suit of this armor provide spot-treatment for wounds. This armor became combat-capable with the addition of an ablative layer above the suit.

name: NanoTech Scout Helmet
description: Developed by CryoTech Industries to give front-line patrols a boost of endurance for long or exhausting deployments, this suit has found niche uses among those who prefer sprightliness over protective capacity.

name: NanoTech Voltaic Helmet
description: CryoTech Industries created this automated suit to address growing concerns among enlisted FDC that mission-critical bio-augmentations were failing in the middle of operations. It replaces positively charged ions with negatives in the blood via nanite injectors.

name: NanoTech Cognizant Helmet
description: With the inevitable risk of injury during deep space mining, CryoTech Industries engineered this armor to help regain consciousness in the event of a disaster. Redeveloped with lighter wear for use in combat, this armor can help the user better keep their mind intact during a battle.

name: Hypobaric Helmet
description: The favorite of assassins, the light Hypobaric Armor strategically releases mildly toxic muscle relaxants to steady aim and focus its wearer. This slows the user’s metabolism, reducing bioelectric output.

name: Metabolic Helmet
description: This armor, based on CryoTech Vitality Suits, foregoes strictly legal serums for added regenerative capability, though one’s immune system rebels against these stronger synthetic drugs over time.

name: Venom Helmet
description: Venom armor uses strong amphetamine injections to accelerate one’s metabolism, producing extra bioelectric energy, but prolonged over-oxygenation can lead to lightheadedness and ultimately panic or catatonia in its user.

name: Detox Combat Helmet
description: Designed by enterprising Brotherhood engineers sympathetic to the plight of their front-line kin, this armor includes automated systems that suppress silly, overambitious immune responses, purging one’s resistance to combat stimulants.

name: Carcinus Forelimbs
description: The heavily carapaced forelimb of the Carcinus genus of xenomorphs from Necars Field. The claws on its forelimbs consist of a large amount of organic minerals which serve to maintain its impeccable sharpness.

name: Carcinus Cranium
description: The heavyset head of the Carcinus genus of xenomorphs from Necars Field. The carbonite reinforced cranium of the Carcinus provides ample protection to its cerebral matter.

name: Carcinus Dorsal Carapace
description: The section of extremely thick chitinous carapace from the dorsal regions of the Carcinus genus of xenomorphs from Necars Field. This is where the carapace is the thickest for the Carcinus's body, as it is meant to protect the central nervous system located just beneath.

name: Behemoth Forelimbs
description: The muscular forelimb of the Behemoth genus of xenomorphs from Necars Field. Although the carapace encasing the muscle within is not particularly thick, the molecular structure of the minerals in the claws gives a strength that rivals that of diamonds.

name: Behemoth Cranium
description: The immense head of the Behemoth genus of xenomorphs from Necars Field. The size and shape of the cranial regions of the Behemoth's skull reflects the tremendous amount of brain matter enshrouded within.

name: Behemoth Tail
description: The severed tail of a member of the Behemoth genus of xenomorphs from Necars Field. The tail contains significant muscle mass as it is used by the Behemoth to steady and balance itself whenever it walks.

name: Sturdy Carapace
description: The forcefully removed carapace of a xenomorph. Still has some sinewy muscle fibre and fluid-secreting glands attached.

name: Piercing Oculi
description: The eyes of a xenomorph. Their biological structure allow these xenomorphs to see just as well in complete darkness as in the day.

name: Pulsating Cerebrum
description: Carefully extracted from the skull of a xenomorph. The brains of these creatures are much sought-after by scientists for studies into xenomorph intelligence.

name: Serrated Claws
description: The claw of a xenomorph. It is always carefully removed from the xenomorph carcass to prevent damage to the carapace, which is popular for refinement and production of local souvenirs.

name: Mantis Cranium
description: Severed head of the Mantis genus of xenomorphs. Although not particularly large to allow this xenomorph to be effectively flight-capable, it is a rich source of xenomorphic fluids as all of its endocrine glands are located here.

name: Mantis Metathorax
description: The middle portion of the thoracic region of the Mantis genus of xenomorphs. This part of the xenomorph is extremely muscular, allowing the mantis to thrust its caudal sting with devastating force.

name: Mantis Mesothorax
description: The rear-most portion of the thoracic region of the Mantis genus of xenomorphs. This part of the xenomorph has the caudal sting attached to it. Although it does not contain any venom, the sting is reinforced with enough precious minerals to allow it to resist damage.

name: Sticky Xenomorphic Fluid
description: The fluid extracted from various xenomorph parts, particularly those that contain fluid-producing glands.

name: Solid Carbonite Shell
description: Extracted from the outermost layer of a xenomorph's carapace, which is primarily made of carbonite which has proven to be very effective as a reinforcing agent.

name: Xenomorph Proteins
description: Proteins extracted from the muscle tissues of xenomorphs.

name: Ultra Resilient Mineral
description: Extracted from the claws, spikes, and stings of the various xenomorphs, which are naturally coated with a thin layer of this mineral which gives it its incredible resilience and robustness.

name: Deuterium Water
description: The natural respiratory process of xenomorphs produces heavy water (water with deuterium in place of normal hydrogen molecules), which is then excreted through the intestinal tract.

name: Xenomorph Hemolymph
description: Hemolymph fills the internal cavities of the xenomorphs, acting as both blood and interstitial fluid. The hemolymph is pumped around the body both by the heart and the xenomorph's muscular movements.

name: Bloody Xenomorph Slime
description: As the mantis has a dual circulatory system that utilizes both hemolymph and blood, the two fluids often mix into a bloody mix of what appears to be slime mixed with significant traces of blood.

name: Xenomorph Endocrine Glands
description: The glands of xenomorphs are much sought after for the rare secretions produced that appear to have strong medicinal properties, according to preliminary studies made by biologists on Necars Field.
